title: LF Duo anyrole just add me and we will talk and see - must be atleast gold last season or gold skill
body:
Add me ign - mrlazydude
coming off a bad loss streak but gonna climb now, currently s3,  i play mid sup adc and meta

replies.body: Saying "Must be at least gold last season OR GOLD SKILL" is just asking for a bronze to come in an believe he's gold.
Loool im flattered that u want to play with me ( a  drunk bronzie)
